description: Defines a React functional component named Sidebar that manages a watchlist of stock symbols, allowing users to add, remove, and select stocks within a sidebar UI. It interacts with a global context for shared state management.

methods.name: Sidebar()
methods.description: React functional component managing watchlist UI and interactions.

methods.name: handleAddStock
methods.description: Handles adding a new stock symbol to the watchlist on form submission.

methods.name: handleRemove
methods.description: Removes a stock symbol from the watchlist.

methods.name: handleSelect
methods.description: Selects a stock symbol in the watchlist.
